name: Gems Land: Match 3 Shine
description:
New match 3 games. It is simple and fun, but also quite challenging. Easy to play, difficult to master

Features:
use powerful props to enjoy explosive fun
reach various targets to level up
challenging but fun obstacles
easy to control, fun to play, great graphics!
just swap & match with your single finger!
swap to match 3 or more jewels of the same
match 4 or more gems to get special bonus
addictive and everlasting match 3 gameplay
